prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered forward-leaning pose with hands gripping ethereal reins, chibi proportions with large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth. Hair or spiral-wound geometric tendrils incorporating spiral, hexagonal_lattice, mobius_strip patterns from sacred geometry symbolism. Outfit is unique: neutral grey and neutral grey fluid draped garments with wave geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for flow and depth, elaborate with shifting Water element curved motifs and descending patterns and vesica_piscis emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like caduceus of communication with intertwined geometric serpents with ethereal spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like rippling water wisps and droplet particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor NOCAMAL's profile: 'He who is servant of the arrow', Aethyr LIT, Water element, Tarot The Chariot, Sephirot Hod, Zodiac Cancer, embodying the essence: 'When NOCAMAL is near, discernment hums in measured harmony wisdom unfolding like a deliberate, guidi...' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.head_shape: large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with crystal-like facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth

outfit.base: fluid draped garments with wave geometric patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for flow and depth
outfit.details: Water element curved motifs and descending patterns
outfit.magical_essence: rippling water wisps and droplet particles

visual_elements.accessory: caduceus of communication with intertwined geometric serpents
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who is servant of the arrow'
profile_data.essence: When NOCAMAL is near, discernment hums in measured harmony wisdom unfolding like a deliberate, guiding hymn.
profile_data.angelic_role: Virtue of Guiding Wisdom; governs abyssal angels.
profile_data.form_description: A translucent water-crystal form that shifts between liquid mobility and geometric precision, representing the liminal space between structure and flow, wisdom and adaptability
profile_data.color_reasoning: Aquamarine connects to water element and Cancer's emotional depth; silver represents lunar wisdom and reflective consciousness
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Spiral represents evolutionary wisdom, hexagon symbolizes sacred geometry's perfect structure, mobius symbolizes infinite transformation
